subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Ticket Scalping
lead_paragraph: A weak resale market has a growing number of Mets and Yankees season-ticket holders considering whether to drop their seats next year, or switch to a plan with fewer games or cheaper seats.
snippet: A weak resale market has a growing number of Mets and Yankees season-ticket holders considering whether to drop their seats next year, or switch to a plan with fewer games or cheaper seats.
